All Known Implementing Classes:

public interface Protocol

Method Detail

getRuntimeState

RuntimeState getRuntimeState()
RuntimeState is location-specific state that is independent of the protocol instance. This includes the runtime clock and random number generator.

Returns:
Local node's runtime state.

getSelectDistribution

Distribution<Address> getSelectDistribution()
Execute the select function for this Protocol instance and return its address distribution.

Returns:
Address distribution

Execute the rate function for this Protocol instance.

executeUpdate

void executeUpdate(Protocol other)
Execute the update function of this protocol on another local protocol instance

Parameters:
other -

getLogState

java.lang.Object getLogState()
Returns an object that represents local node state. By default, the instance itself. This will be JSON-serialized into the log. Circular references cause serialization to break; in that case, this function will need to be overridden or the offending fields marked as transient.

Returns:
JSON-serializable object representing node state for logging purposes
